attributes.action: Ensure pictures of our monarch are not removed from our universities
attributes.additional_details: It is an insult to the British people and the Royal family themselves.
attributes.background: Make it illegal for Royal pictures from being removed by the so called woke faction.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Government and Parliament are not responsible for the decoration of rooms.
